article.headline: Canisius 55, Howard 50
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Dewitt Doss scored 12 of his 16 points in the second half to lead Canisius to a 55-50 victory over Howard on Saturday. Doss spearheaded a 16-6 that put the Golden Griffins ahead 39-37 with 12:50 to play. Canisius (4-3) never relinquished the lead after that. Howard (2-5) rallied within 51-50 with 1:05 left, but failed to convert on its next two possessions, while Canisius made two free throws and a layup. James "Mac" Wilkinson had 28 points and nine rebounds for the Bison, who lost their third straight.
